name: evolve-idle-automation
description: Adds unlockable automations to Evolve Idle

scripts.start: web-ext run --watch-ignored *.* **/firefox-profiles/**/* src/**/* settings/**/* node_modules/**/* icons/**/* --start-url https://pmotschmann.github.io/Evolve/ --firefox-profile=.\firefox-profiles\evolve-idle --profile-create-if-missing --keep-profile-changes --verbose
